name_zh: 中国独立开发者项目列表
description_zh: 汇总中国独立开发者的优秀项目。入选标准：网站 / App。入选的产品会加入作者github库的Readme版面中。目前项目有接近50k star
description_en: Summarize excellent projects of independent developers in China. Eligibility criteria: websites / apps. The selected products will be added to the Readme section of the author's GitHub repository. Currently, the project has nearly 50k stars.
submitRequirements_zh: 投稿内容尽可能简短，快速突出产品重点。不收录开发者工具
submitRequirements_en: Make your submission as brief as possible and quickly highlight the key features of your product.
rating_en: It will be included in GitHub.
